scripts.dev:win: powershell -NoLogo -NoProfile -Command "$env:PY_APP='..\py\app.py'; Start-Process powershell -ArgumentList '-NoLogo','-NoProfile','-Command','cd ..\py; if(-not (Test-Path .venv)) { python -m venv .venv }; .\.venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1; pip install -q -r requirements-sam.txt; python app.py' -WindowStyle Normal; node server.js"
